channel.title: Posts on Two Guys, One Crest
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Two Guys, One Crest

item.description: Well, I finally got this blog setup. It only took me till the day before we start walking. We’re currently in Winthrop, WA staying at a nice Airbnb. Winthrop is a small town in the Northern Cascades. The city and locals have all been really nice. Kind of a cool little city, one of the main streets looks like is from the old west. We’re currently doing some final preparations before we head out tomorrow.
